name: Zephyr
flavor_text: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

frame.name: Adaptive Frame
frame.description:
[Heavy Attack]  : Launch a heavy uppercut attack.
Heavy attacks are stronger with full energy.

perks.description: Increased damage at the cost of sword ammo.
perks.name: Jagged Edge

perks.description: Sword Guard has balanced overall defenses.
perks.name: Balanced Guard

perks.description: Rapid sword strikes increase this weapon's damage for a short duration. Guarding also ends the effect.
perks.name: Whirlwind Blade
